https://www.wsj.com/articles/patriots-review-on-broadway-putin-peter-morgan-russia-michael-stuhlbarg-b5577abf

Will Keen as Vladimir Putin in ‘Patriots.’ Photo: Matthew MurphyNew York

It’s a relief to discover that Vladimir Putin, while a principal figure in Peter Morgan’s play “Patriots,” is not the central one. With Mr. Putin’s brutal war on Ukraine and other baleful news out of Russia frequently making headlines, the prospect of watching a drama focused on him would not seem to be an appealing entertainment.
